def predict_sentiment(user_input):
    sentiment_model = keras.models.load_model("sentiment_model_gpt2")
    sentiment_prediction = sentiment_model.predict(user_input)
    sentiment_probability = np.max(sentiment_prediction)
    sentiment_class = np.argmax(sentiment_prediction)
    if sentiment_probability > 0.5:
        sentiment_result = "I'm sorry but I'm not very sure but I'm very happy that you are having such a great day! I'm so glad I could help you." if sentiment_class == 0 else "Oh I'm sorry but I'm not very sure but I'm so sad that you are having such a bad day!"
    else:
        sentiment_result = "I'm sorry but I'm not very sure but I'm so sad that you are having such a bad day! I'm so sorry I cannot help you with that!" if sentiment_class == 0 else "Oh I'm sorry but I'm not very sure but I'm so happy that you are having such a great day!"

    return sentiment_result
